</section>			<section
		id="description"
		class="content-feeder"
		data-dojo-type="escapio/components/base/ContentFeeder"
		data-dojo-props="step:0"
		itemprop="description"
		data-dojo-mixins="escapio/components/event-tracker/ContentFeederTrackerMixin"
		data-box="Beschreibung"
	>
		<header><h1>Hotel description</h1></header>
					<section class="item ">
								<div>High ceilings, exposed wood beams, antique furniture and works of art from the 16th century give a special touch to each of the 23 individually furnished rooms and suites. In addition, they offer all the necessary modern amenities, including a minibar, Wi-Fi Internet access, LCD satellite TV and air conditioning. Surrounded by the green hills of the Veio Park, guests will find relaxation at the gates of the ‘eternal city’. A relaxing holiday is also ensured by the small but comfortable spa area, spacious outdoor pool and traditional Umbrian cuisine, which is served by an open fire.</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item ">
									<header>4-star hotel: modern comfort with a historical touch</header>
								<div>The 23 rooms of the Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais inspire with a unique blend of modern comfort and historic ambience. Each of the rooms is individually furnished with high-class antique pieces from the 15th to the 19th century. Renovated in 2002, all rooms have bathroom with shower, as well as a safe and minibar. The rooms’ state of the art equipment, including Bose sound systems, wireless Internet access, LCD satellite TV, individually adjustable heating and air conditioning ensures a pleasant stay. Some of the suites also have a Jacuzzi or a private garden. The three-storied tower suite boasts its own panoramic terrace on the roof.</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item hidden-xs">
									<header>Romantic hotel: rooms with four-poster beds, suites with fireplace, atmospheric gardens</header>
								<div>For romantics who want to spend a relaxed weekend within its historic walls, the Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais, the hotel provides special accommodation options. Ornate canopy beds with details from the 18th century create a nostalgic atmosphere in the rooms. With a fireplace and a bathroom with tiled Jacuzzi, the Manzolini suite ensures many leisurely hours. The estate’s beautiful Italian garden entice visitors to explore its paths. Several terraces, like the Magnolia terrace next to the fragrant orange garden or the Fountain terrace, surrounded by pine trees, invite couples to spend idyllic hours together.</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item hidden-xs">
									<header>Historic surroundings: Sleep and dine well in a lovingly restored medieval castle</header>
								<div>The Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais is housed within the walls of a historic castle, which was built from the ruins of a Roman villa by the Cancellieri noble family between the 10th and 13th centuries. Since then it has been inhabited by many noble families. Lovingly restored, the former charm of the building was preserved as it was transformed into a hotel. High ceilings, wooden beams, stained-glass windows, antique furniture and works of art bear witness to the noble past of the hotel. Marble and terracotta floors complete the luxurious furnishings.</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item hidden-xs">
									<header>Food & drink: Buffet breakfast, traditional Umbrian cuisine, bar with a stone fireplace</header>
								<div>In the morning a generous breakfast buffet is available for the guests of the Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais, which can be enjoyed on the terrace or on request in one’s room. Lunch and dinner are served à la carte in the restaurant "La Locanda". Just like the rest of the hotel, the restaurant is also designed in medieval style and has an exposed vaulted ceiling, stone walls and an open fireplace. La Locanda serves regional and typical Umbrian dishes prepared with seasonal and fresh produce. An exquisite wine list completes the range. Each month an evening with live music programme is offered. From 3 to 11 pm, guests can enjoy fine wines and other beverages in a quiet atmosphere at the stone fireplace of the hotel bar.</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item hidden-xs">
									<header>Sports & recreation: Exclusive spa, spacious outdoor pool and high-class golf courses nearby</header>
								<div>The guests of the Castello della Castelluccia Hotel Relais have access to a large outdoor pool with sun loungers, which is open seasonally from June to September. The exclusive spa area features a Jacuzzi, sauna and a Turkish bath. One can also arrange individual massages, cosmetic treatments and healing therapies in advance. The grounds also include several tennis courts. Just a few kilometres from the hotel are several high-class golf courses such as Ogliata, Le Querce and Marco Simone or Parco dei Medici. Special arrangements with some golf courses allow the hotel guests exclusive access to the courts and other. Surrounded by a large park with lush Italian gardens, the grounds offer hours of leisurely walks. The centre of Rome, with its many historical buildings and monuments, is just 15-20 minutes away.</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item hidden-xs">
									<header>Location: Rural tranquility at the gates of Rome</header>
								<div>The Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais is nestled in hilly countryside to the north of Rome. The Metro station La Giustiniana is 2 kilometres away, which offers good connections to the centre of the Italian capital. A free shuttle service to central Rome operates on request several times daily. The ring road around Rome is 4 km away and the Leonardo da Vinci Fiumicino airport can be reached after 35 km.</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item hidden-xs">
									<header>What else? Marriage and events in charming ambience</header>
								<div>Three well-equipped conference rooms, with Bose sound systems, microphones and screen, can host meetings and celebrations for up to 500 people. The hotel also specializes in organizing and conducting weddings. Three stylish rooms are available for the wedding dinner: the elegant "Salone delle festivals", with wooden floor and iron chandeliers, the medieval restaurant "La Locanda" as well as a spacious terrace overlooking the park. Additional wedding menus cater to guests with Umbrian cuisine.</div>
			</section>
			</section>

content: pool, free wifi, spa area Hotel Type: Romantic, 4 star, Quiet, Family, Castle Hotel size (number of rooms): 23 Check-in: 15:00 | Check-out: 12:00 36 Modern comfort in a charming medieval building Nearby world-class golf courses The spacious outdoor pool Free parking at the hotel Reservations are required for spa treatments The outdoor swimming pool is open only from June to September The rooms vary greatly in size and facilities Car hire is an advantage wheelchair access concierge elevator wireless LAN wireless LAN in lobby free wireless LAN in rooms free internet in lobby free internet cable in rooms free 24 hour internet access air conditioning in all rooms night porter non-smoking building entire hotel incl. lobby parking guarded parking, parking spaces, free parking spaces terrace breakfast served on terrace, sunbeds, deckchairs, sunshades, valley views, nature views laundry service garden / outside area sunbathing area, sunbeds, deckchairs, sunshades tanning bed free bar café restaurant restaurant La Locanda open mornings, open midday, open evenings restaurant Pool Bar open mornings, open midday reception 24 hour reception airport shuttle 70 € per trip shuttle to attractions tour and excursion bookings events service weddings room service sewing / ironing service roof terrace breakfast served on the roof terrace, sunbeds, deckchairs, sunshades, valley views, nature views safe free late Check out Via Carlo Cavina, 40 00123 La Giustiniana Lazio, Italy Map motorway 20 km (A1 - Milano/Roma) train station 1 km (Ipogeo degli Ottavi) airport 25 km (Leonardo da Vinci) public transport stop 1 km (Ipogeo degli Ottavi) nightlife district 15 km (Campo dei Fiori) mountains 60 km (Terminillo) shopping 15 km (Via del Corso) outdoor pool (In Hotel) golf course 0,5 km (Golg Club La Castelluccia) historic district 15 km (Trastevere) tourist sights 1 km (Città di Vejo) city center 15 km (Roma Centro) beach 10 km (Fregene ) tennis 1 km (Le Molette) forest 1 km winter sports resort 60 km (Terminillo) High ceilings, exposed wood beams, antique furniture and works of art from the 16th century give a special touch to each of the 23 individually furnished rooms and suites. In addition, they offer all the necessary modern amenities, including a minibar, Wi-Fi Internet access, LCD satellite TV and air conditioning. Surrounded by the green hills of the Veio Park, guests will find relaxation at the gates of the ‘eternal city’. A relaxing holiday is also ensured by the small but comfortable spa area, spacious outdoor pool and traditional Umbrian cuisine, which is served by an open fire. The 23 rooms of the Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais inspire with a unique blend of modern comfort and historic ambience. Each of the rooms is individually furnished with high-class antique pieces from the 15th to the 19th century. Renovated in 2002, all rooms have bathroom with shower, as well as a safe and minibar. The rooms’ state of the art equipment, including Bose sound systems, wireless Internet access, LCD satellite TV, individually adjustable heating and air conditioning ensures a pleasant stay. Some of the suites also have a Jacuzzi or a private garden. The three-storied tower suite boasts its own panoramic terrace on the roof. For romantics who want to spend a relaxed weekend within its historic walls, the Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais, the hotel provides special accommodation options. Ornate canopy beds with details from the 18th century create a nostalgic atmosphere in the rooms. With a fireplace and a bathroom with tiled Jacuzzi, the Manzolini suite ensures many leisurely hours. The estate’s beautiful Italian garden entice visitors to explore its paths. Several terraces, like the Magnolia terrace next to the fragrant orange garden or the Fountain terrace, surrounded by pine trees, invite couples to spend idyllic hours together. The Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais is housed within the walls of a historic castle, which was built from the ruins of a Roman villa by the Cancellieri noble family between the 10th and 13th centuries. Since then it has been inhabited by many noble families. Lovingly restored, the former charm of the building was preserved as it was transformed into a hotel. High ceilings, wooden beams, stained-glass windows, antique furniture and works of art bear witness to the noble past of the hotel. Marble and terracotta floors complete the luxurious furnishings. In the morning a generous breakfast buffet is available for the guests of the Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais, which can be enjoyed on the terrace or on request in one’s room. Lunch and dinner are served à la carte in the restaurant "La Locanda". Just like the rest of the hotel, the restaurant is also designed in medieval style and has an exposed vaulted ceiling, stone walls and an open fireplace. La Locanda serves regional and typical Umbrian dishes prepared with seasonal and fresh produce. An exquisite wine list completes the range. Each month an evening with live music programme is offered. From 3 to 11 pm, guests can enjoy fine wines and other beverages in a quiet atmosphere at the stone fireplace of the hotel bar. The guests of the Castello della Castelluccia Hotel Relais have access to a large outdoor pool with sun loungers, which is open seasonally from June to September. The exclusive spa area features a Jacuzzi, sauna and a Turkish bath. One can also arrange individual massages, cosmetic treatments and healing therapies in advance. The grounds also include several tennis courts. Just a few kilometres from the hotel are several high-class golf courses such as Ogliata, Le Querce and Marco Simone or Parco dei Medici. Special arrangements with some golf courses allow the hotel guests exclusive access to the courts and other. Surrounded by a large park with lush Italian gardens, the grounds offer hours of leisurely walks. The centre of Rome, with its many historical buildings and monuments, is just 15-20 minutes away. The Castello Della Castelluccia Hotel Relais is nestled in hilly countryside to the north of Rome. The Metro station La Giustiniana is 2 kilometres away, which offers good connections to the centre of the Italian capital. A free shuttle service to central Rome operates on request several times daily. The ring road around Rome is 4 km away and the Leonardo da Vinci Fiumicino airport can be reached after 35 km. Three well-equipped conference rooms, with Bose sound systems, microphones and screen, can host meetings and celebrations for up to 500 people. The hotel also specializes in organizing and conducting weddings. Three stylish rooms are available for the wedding dinner: the elegant "Salone delle festivals", with wooden floor and iron chandeliers, the medieval restaurant "La Locanda" as well as a spacious terrace overlooking the park. Additional wedding menus cater to guests with Umbrian cuisine.
